name: spimvALT
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

comment: Alternate proof of ~ spimv . Note that it requires only ~ ax-1 through ~ ax-5 together with ~ ax6e . Currently, proofs derive from ~ ax6v , but if ~ ax-6 could be used instead, this proof would reduce axiom usage. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-1993.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 . (Revised by BJ, 29-Nov-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
